response.original_title: In the Belly of the Moon
response.overview: Every ounce of mezcal embodies vast tracts of Mesoamerican history. To experience its essence, we enter into its many worlds and wander its many paths. The destination is everywhere and the journey is intoxicating.
response.tagline: We have to enter its many worlds, wander its many paths.
response.title: In the Belly of the Moon
